basics.name: Asa Chelius
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.  I am also an avid volunteer, machinist, and EMT.

work.summary: Developed and manufactured a 3D printing filament isolation box that monitored weight and humidity.
highlights: Developed software in C to run Arduino data collection and transmission
Used Solidoworks to extensively CAD a project and hold a design review

work.summary: Programed CNC machines to run high tolerance aerospace parts
highlights: Understand and practice GD&T on a daily basis
Use Solidworks to derive complex parts from drawings that are to be used in Mastercam
Program and run high tolerance parts on a Makino D500, DMU MORI 64, and Haas VF4
Help pateints work through emotional stress from drug withdrawl
Encourage pateints to stay in recovery and rehab

awards.title: Principles Award
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who show adept academic potentail in high school.

awards.title: Seventh Place
awards.summary: My team won seventh place in 2022 in the annual Formula SAE competition
